price: 72. Hij zei: “Heb ik je niet verteld dat je geen geduld met mij zou kunnen hebben?”
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
